max_allowed_processing_time_ms.description: A threshold value for the allowed processing time. If the processing time exceeds this value, it will be considered a warning state. [ms]

max_acceptable_consecutive_delay_ms.description: A threshold value for the error state. If the duration since the last processing timestamp, which ended within max_allowed_processing_time_ms, exceeds this value, it will be considered an error state. [ms]

validation_callback_interval_ms.description: An interval value for a timer callback that checks whether the current state meets the max_acceptable_consecutive_delay_ms condition. [ms]
